note.p: Birth: Oberramstadt, near Darmstadt, Germany (01 July 1742 or 01 July 1744)
Career: Professor Extraordinarius (1770) and Professor Ordinarius (1775) in Physics, University of Gottingen; wrote on probability and astronomy
References: Linde Katritzky, 'Coleridge's Links with Leading Men of Science' in NR 1995 vol 49 pp 261-276, plate
Linde Katritzky, 'Georg Christoph Lichtenberg, FRS' in NR 1984-85 vol 39 pp 41-49
Notes: Christian names on certificate and in R are given as 'Gottfried Carl'. DSB gives birth date as 01 July 1742
